lender.name: Shellia

lender.occupational_info: I teach 13 and 14 year olds reading/literature skills.

lender.name: carol
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to countries around the world and enjoyed the hospitality of many people. This is a small way to pass forward a message of peace and friendship.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: it's our global duty to help

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: God cares for those who are the marginalized in society. We are called to be the hands and feet of God in serving others.
lender.occupational_info: Share God's love with teenagers and teach them about who He is.

lender.name: Atle H
lender.loan_because: I don't see why *not*. Simple way of providing funds that can be used again and again for the benefit other families.

lender.name: Rebecca

lender.occupational_info: I work in my family's business selling garden augers.

lender.name: Angel

lender.name: Shannelle
lender.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Susan

lender.occupational_info: I work for one of the top research universities in the US. My team facilitates the acquisition and management of research funding to support students and professors.

lender.name: sara

lender.name: jennifer

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: we have so much and KIVA allows us to share.

lender.name: Tim & Karen

lender.occupational_info: David was an analyst for computer system projects at banks. Natily's been an actress and a web designer. Now they roller skate in a roller derby league in New York City.

lender.name: deb
lender.loan_because: we are all one family on this tiny planet
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures of people, places, and things

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Real generosity toward the future lies in giving to the present.
lender.occupational_info: I have been fortunate enough to work in the food industry, retail, education, accounting, computers, graphic design and interior design.

lender.name: christel
lender.loan_because: i'm thankful Kiva allows me to support women entrepreneurs in Africa, Asia, and places in between!
lender.occupational_info: Management consultant / global thinker and former sustainable development specialist

lender.name: David

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: It's a very good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I have beef cows.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I believe that is what my creator would want.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mobile mechanic

lender.name: Lee-Ann & Natasha
lender.loan_because: we'd rather put our money here than in the big bowl of change on the bookshelf. Not to mention it's thrilling to do help someone way over 'there' from little old 'here'.

lender.name: twajjo
lender.loan_because: The first thing a human being deserves is respect. They can only detract from that.
lender.occupational_info: I organize the thinking of computer software developers so that they can cooperate together to produce better software than they could individually and separately.

lender.name: Eric & Whanda
lender.loan_because: It is our duty to assist our fellow human beings who are in need. Those of us who are blessed and given much need to give back to those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Eric- I am a dad and husband.In addition, a Family Doctor in Southern California. Whanda- CEO of eHealthSupplies.com, a wife and mother of 3 children

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Empowering our neighbors can change the world.

lender.name: Rahul
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to create a life of their own.
lender.occupational_info:
Spock - http://www.spock.com - is developing a search engine that helps users find and discover people. With over one hundred million people already indexed and millions added everyday, Spock is building the broadest and deepest people specific search engine.
The team has extensive experience in search from leading companies including Friendster, Netscape, Yahoo, and Microsoft. Spock has received over $8 million in investments to date from Clearstone Venture Partners and Opus Capital Ventures.

lender.name: Nestor
lender.loan_because: I believe in Grameen Bank founded by Muhamud Yunus. I read his book and m daughter spent 6 weeks working with them in Bangladesh.
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor who specializes in severe mental disorders caused by biochemical imbalances and traumatic injuries to the brain. I also help people with nervous conditions caused by psychological traumas of childhood and adolescence. I use psychoanalytic, behavioral and systems theories as my guiding theoretical framework when doing psychotherapy and bio-neuro-pharmaco-medical science when there is a need to add medications.

lender.name: Denver Colorado
lender.loan_because: It is a nice to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Professional ENTER key hitter

lender.name: Hari
lender.loan_because: My dog told me to... :)
lender.occupational_info: I help to build telephone and computer networks

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: A small contribution makes a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a film sound post production company.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I Feel its a great opportunity to help others who need some funds to get their businesses off the ground, and really change their lives.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: there's more to life than just having money and you can't take it with you when you check out!
lender.occupational_info: I work at a Fortune 500 company that manufactures Copiers in the Rochester, NY area

lender.name: Laura & Tyler
lender.loan_because: We loan in order to economically empower others around the world.

lender.name: Cammie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: people need help
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for Redemptorist Catholic priests and brothers

lender.name: madhu
lender.loan_because: i want to start a little gaming zone buisness... that have a lots of money to start that buiness... so please any one help me...

lender.name: Kerwin
lender.loan_because: I am from a developing country and have seen the need that exists there and the effects when this need is not met by the governments - either because they simply can't or they just don't want to. Lending is a sure way to help empower the poor, but mostly I think it allows for a certain reconstitution, or an establishment, of self respect because the poor are now able to help themselves and their families out through their own efforts, not through a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I'm being 'an accessory' to the change that I seek in the world.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: God has been good to us and we want to share our good fortune with businesspeople in other countries who are trying to improve their lives and build their countries.
lender.occupational_info: Tim works in marketing, helping businesses tell customers about their products. Leslie works in banking, helping people to manage their money.

lender.name: Simona
lender.loan_because: I should. It's great to have the opportunity to helps someone start their own business or expand their business. I'm happy to be a part of it.

lender.name: susan
lender.occupational_info: Nordland, WA

lender.name: class of 09
lender.loan_because: we loan because there is a sincere desire to help others in need throughout our classroom.
lender.occupational_info: we would describe our work as a help to others and we do it out of care.

lender.name: Gilles
lender.loan_because: Banks exploit people by asking them high interests.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying Social Work

lender.name: Ajit Verghese
lender.loan_because: as an Entrepreneur, I believe that we need to establish a culture of giving which starts in our communities, moves local and then goes global. Every entrepreneur had someone in their lives that gave them their first break. As entrepreneurs, It is imperative that we get involved!
lender.occupational_info: I just finished my MBA from Babson and am launching a tech startup as well as consulting in the tech / social media space for a few brands. I am involved in the convergence of the technology, the Internet, new media, and music.....and I am trying to find a way to change the world I live in.

lender.name: Beijo
lender.loan_because: I can, even though I am retired on a fixed income. My strategy has been to loan $25 a month until the repaid loans would be coming back at the rate of $25 a month, then continue to reinvest. I was surprised that it took a short 8 months, and since then I have only been reinvesting. It is so much fun to see and hear from people all over the world! I don't recommend my stragegy if you can give more, but for me, it works well.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I believe in the people who have to work and support their families in 3rd world countries . We have to work as in concert with the world to feed and educate the children. Hungry, poverty stricken, uneducated children do not make good world leaders. This is one way to change the order of things to a more balanced, conscious society.
lender.occupational_info: My background is nursing. I have volunteered 3x in Tanzania and am deeply gratified by doing so.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I would want the same opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Economics and other social studies classes to students in international schools.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: What better way to help someone who is trying to better themselves in a developing country. I know lending through Kiva that all the money I lend goes to the person I want.

lender.name: Clyde
lender.loan_because: I love to give and I want to see others succeed all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers, I network computers, I build websites, I advise on social networking.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I think we can make a difference, one person at a time.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are working hard to better themselves.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: "A society that has more justice is a society that needs less charity." Ralph Nader
lender.occupational_info: Working with organisations to help them focus on what they do best by helping them to structure their aims, prioritise their 'to do' list and create good working practice.

lender.name: Disinterestedwisdom
lender.loan_because: A great friend and humanitarian got me involved.
lender.occupational_info: Keeping busy with a number of things.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I'm able to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a doctor for animals

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: KIVA gives everyone a chance to share on a personal level with people around the world. Those of us who are blessed can help make this world a better place, by sharing our hope and love. These people are asking for a chance to improve their lives. They are asking only for a hand-up, not a hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of 3 grown children and have 6 grandchildren. I am truely blessed with family, food, and good water. Call me "Living the good life in the United States."

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Much has been given to me. I want to give to others.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe that successful small scale business is the key to developing local economies. With the help of funding, entrepreneurs can get their ideas off the ground.
lender.occupational_info: I provide veterinary services for people and their animals.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help women who are working to help themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I help to make work processes and work tools more usable for people, which reduces stress and injuries.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have had a good education and a good job to support my family. I want to share my bounty with others sot hey can have better lives, too.
lender.occupational_info: To Design and Build Oil and Gas Plants

lender.name: Gaby
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world, so I am starting with baby steps.
lender.occupational_info: I work full time in front of a computer making books. At home I paint and make crafts.

lender.name: Martine
lender.loan_because: I had a dream that one day every human being on earth would live decently... That's a way to fullfil my dream.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: If I am able to help, then I have a responsibility to do so. Simple enough huh? Wish more people thought that way.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I have seen the beauty of many faces, many religons, many ways of life the world over. One thing is clear: we are all the same. We all have the same hopes and dreams. If my little contribution can change someone's life, then I have made the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am interested in how people lived a long time ago. What did they look like? What was their art like? What types of things did they use everyday for farming, eating, jewelry, clothing? I dig in the ground for remnants of the things people left behind long ago. If you do this carefully you can get a lot fo information from each layer of earth that you dig up. Sometimes I find broken pottery, glass, arrow heads, and beads. I have also found human and animal bones. Human bones tell us a lot about how people lived. They can tell us their age, their health, and sometimes their status. I find ancient and modern people very fascinating!

lender.name: Kelly and David Funk
lender.loan_because: Even small amounts of U.S. dollars can make a tremendous difference in the lives of others living in developing countries. And, it's the right thing to do...
lender.occupational_info: Investors and volunteers at Peace Awareness Labryrinth and Gardens in Los Angeles, CA, www.peacelabyrinth.org

lender.name: Burke
lender.loan_because: Giving is getting.
lender.occupational_info: Learn from kids and they learn from me.

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: Are you looking or have been looking for financial assistance,help or loan?here comes a great opportunity.i am a certified and licensed lender and i have some money to lend out to any serious and honest person[s] or firm[s] who need either long or stort term loans at 4% as the interest rate,if interested contact me via mail:paulokojie13@yahoo.com
lender.occupational_info: Are you looking or have been looking for financial assistance,help or loan?here comes a great opportunity.i am a certified and licensed lender and i have some money to lend out to any serious and honest person[s] or firm[s] who need either long or stort term loans at 4% as the interest rate,if interested contact me via mail:paulokojie13@yahoo.com

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I'm realizing my dreams in life and out of it all the one thing that is most important to me after great contemplation is simply a desire to help others find their place, their voice within this world. I believe that if I can help make the difference in one life I will have lived for a greater purpose than that of my own sake.
lender.occupational_info: My company maintains a "First Responder" team which services catastrophe loss sites that are results of hurricane, flooding and earthquake disasters.

lender.name: Benny & Orly
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. G-d has blessed us in so many ways and helping others is our way of a "Thank you!". We also want to set an example for our 2 young kids.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I need good karma points!

lender.name: Marvin & Marcy
lender.loan_because: We (my wife & I) have travelled extensively and have observed how just a small hand up can be so helpfull. This is such an great opportunity and method of offering that helping hand.
lender.occupational_info:
Construction account manager.
Artist / ladies clothing sales

lender.loan_because: love is the only true economic system.

lender.name: shellene
lender.loan_because: I felt that this was the best way for me to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I help with patrons in the library, finding books and of course putting them away. I enjoy my work because luckily I do love to read and love being surrounded by books.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I like to help others help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I teach students who learn differently than "regular" students. (dyslexia, trouble reading, trouble writing, need a little more time, etc...)

lender.loan_because: Beacause I wanted to and it is nice to know that is acually being used for what it is ment for
lender.occupational_info: Im in college

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: How more direct can you get?
lender.occupational_info: I am trying to understand the causes of diabetes

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a healthy family and a steady job. It is important to me that I share with those who need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a state government highway agency. I help pick the location for highway improvements.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I feel its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Surf Goddess Retreats
lender.loan_because: Surf Goddess Retreats is a woman owned and run business and we want to share the same opportunity to women around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Surf Goddess Retreats is a surf, yoga & spa vacation created especially for women. We provide a space where women can have fun learning to surf, while also taking time to pamper themselves in an enchanting environment that revitalizes body, mind and spirit.

lender.name: Dan & Laura
lender.occupation: Teachers at Houston Outdoor Learning Academy

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: Loans foster responsibility, a sense of achievement, and an appreciation for capitalism.

lender.name: Yves
lender.loan_because: i'm worth it. ;-)

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: I see the difference one person can make, both the lender and the recipient.

lender.name: Grace UMC Youth
lender.loan_because: We want to use the gifts God has given us to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: We are a youth ministry located in Sherman, TX

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help now and again.
lender.occupational_info: We all must do what must be done!

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help make new computer software smarter.

lender.name: edward
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is a great way to give back and maybe, just maybe make the world a better place.

lender.name: Kenia
lender.loan_because:
I believe there is abundance in the world! I am NOT anti-poverty; I AM pro-entrepreneurship, pro-business, pro-wealth. I believe in the power of positive thinking, and in helping others not out of pity, but out of compassion and knowledge that there is plenty in the world to go around!
I stand behind the saying: "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime." Of course, one still needs to eat today before he manages to learn for himself in the future! Kiva is essentially the way to give someone fish so that they may reach their business goals and fish for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I design satellites, and I love to write!

lender.name: Jenni
lender.loan_because: everyone needs help and I respect those that work towards their goals.
lender.occupational_info: The main function of my job is getting ink on paper.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I was lucky to be born in the US and raised with love, comfort and education. Loaning to others in need is the least I can do to give back to the world that has given so much to me.
lender.occupational_info: I help employees and companies who have disagreements with each other come to an agreement.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I believe the individuals I lend to should have access to finance.
lender.occupational_info: I was a Kiva Fellow in Cote d'Ivoire & Togo in 2008. And now I work at Kiva!

lender.name: Alyosha19
lender.loan_because: I'm a Baha'i and I like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an account director for an interactive advertising agency.

lender.name: Angus
lender.loan_because: if I didnt I would drink the money. mostly buckfast in case you're wondering
lender.occupational_info: with difficulty

lender.name: Secretagentmarky
lender.loan_because: I have travelled the world and met some amazing people who despite having very little are both welcoming and generous beyond belief. I have seen first hand how hard it is to get a business started and for me this is a great way to give a little something back and hopefully give someone a little help to improve their businesses and their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm very lucky. I work to live and as soon as I have enough I'm off to somewhere new to explore. I love to walk and am just about to begin (June 1st 2007) a walk from the furthest point North of Europe to the furthest point south

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to assist these brave people in their efforts to make something of themselves and to care for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a "jack of all trades" at my company. I proofread, edit, project manage, create or otherwise contribute to the communications materials used by my company to promote our products.

lender.name: Donnee
lender.loan_because: Cost to satisfaction ratio is very high! It just feels good to be a part of this.
lender.occupational_info: I paint portraits and landscapes of pretty places.

lender.name: Property Management
lender.loan_because: "What you leave behind is not what is engraved in stone monuments, but what is woven into the lives of others"
lender.occupational_info: Management of Residential Properties

lender.name: marian
lender.loan_because: It is important to SHARE with the world.

lender.name: Maura
lender.loan_because: empowering individuals become positive economic agents of change is a powerful tool for international development

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves....and if my spare cash can change someones life then it is better than sticking it in a bank :-)
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses to help them understand their financial performance

lender.name: Mikko
lender.loan_because: This is a marvelous idea to help people in poorer countries help themselves. Passive foreign aid may often be a double-edged sword (though yes, necessary at times). Thanks to Kiva ("Nice" in Finnish, by the way :) for enabling people around the world to instead spur people into helping themselves and their society.
lender.occupational_info: I manage GNU/Linux computer systems and communications networks at the University of Helsinki. This might not mean much to most people, sorry, but I don't know how else to put it. I do hope that the One Laptop Per Child project will make both GNU/Linux computers and computer networking, among other things, more familiar to also people in poorer countries.

lender.name: Blair
lender.loan_because: I want to help people cut out their little niche and improve the quality of their life.

lender.name: Susanna
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I write stories for others to read

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I am encouraged by the success of micro-finance and I am honored to be able to participate.
lender.occupational_info: I help build satellite control systems.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I still believe that I can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Learning and teaching

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I believe in the amplifying effect of lending to an entrepreneur. For every dollar I lend to a business person, I know that much more than than is brought to the people that are served by that business.
lender.occupational_info: I design electronic systems and manage a team of engineers and technicians. Together we help deliver news and entertainment to the public.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: I've been given many, many gifts. I'm glad that I am now in a postion to begin giving back.
lender.occupational_info: My primary job is to be a good Mom! At my job I manage software development projects.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info:
I write books. The newest, now being written, is about why and how people help each other, and how we feel about helping -- in our own words.
If you help others (not for a paycheck) and would like to participate in the research for the book, go to my website and click on "Next". Read about the book, and send me email.

lender.name: Mayou, Darius and Mom
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others to succeed.

lender.name: Nura
lender.occupation: buy and sell of tyre sealant

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: helping people find jobs and then training them to be successful

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I watched Black Gold and China Blue on Independent Lens and realized how interdependent my life is with people around the world that provide our goods. I wanted to give back to in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get books and learn how to use computers at a library.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: but for the grace of god go I

lender.name: Katherine

lender.name: Randy and Nancy
lender.loan_because: We've just returned to the US after riding our bicycles through Latin America and meeting the people - it's nice to participate with them a bit.
lender.occupational_info: We rode from "the north pole to the south pole", from the far north of Canada (Inuvik, in Northwest Territories) Argentina in South America.

lender.name: Mahesh
lender.loan_because: *To help someone succeed in life *This concept fascinates me
lender.occupational_info: Doing my PhD in Mechanical Engineering

lender.name: Atticus
lender.loan_because: I like helping people and when they get the money and email me, I feel happy because they are using the money I sent to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Learning new things and practicing old things so that I really remember the old things.

lender.name: Quevin LLC
lender.loan_because: I like to know where my money is going, and not to a generalized cause. Kiva allows me to identify exactly what it is I want to contribute to, and actually see long-term results.
lender.occupational_info: Personalized Web Design, Development & Expert Drupal CMS Customization In the San Francisco Bay Area

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: Loans can make a difference.

lender.name: Zoe and Dre
lender.loan_because: We decided to use the money we had set aside for party favors for our wedding guests to make recurring loans to entrepreneurs through Kiva. We have made four loans to date, and plan on continuing to loan the repaid money forever.
lender.occupational_info: Zoe is a law student and Dre is a business consultant who works with business-owning families.

lender.name: Edgar
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and want to share my good fortune with others. I taught Economics/Free Enterprise for 15 years. I want to help all I can to have a better life through ingenuity and work. I believe in those I have seen on this site.
lender.occupational_info: I teach World History in a high school, but I taught Economics/Free Enterprise for 15 years.

lender.name: Markus
lender.loan_because: It's just the right thing to do....

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: it is helpful.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: What could be more satisfying than helping hardworking folks grow their businesses and prosper?

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do; and I love the idea that I can make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired now, but for 32 years I supervised a word processing center in an urban school district. I also taught typing in adult night school.

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: its my way of making a difference
lender.occupational_info: advise and mentor business leadership teams

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to "give" to charity. In my mind, education and hard work ultimately result in social equity and opportunity. Microfinance helps support hard work, and for parents might help send more kids to school to increase their social opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student studying fuel cells. I hope to teach college within in the next 3-5 years. The picture is my daughter.

lender.name: Jose R.
lender.loan_because: I believe on the principle of support private initiative as the foundation to freedon
lender.occupational_info: Project Manager on the Oil, Gas and Petrochemical Industries

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: this is one of the ways in which I am "paying it forward." "Think of an idea for world change, and put it into action."
lender.occupational_info: I was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Ghana in the 1980's.

lender.name: JAMIE
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and it feels great to help someone.

lender.name: Jed
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help people out but I don't have a lot of disposable income so this seems like a good way to help a lot of people with the small amount of money I can contribute.
lender.occupational_info: I am an environmental and forensic scientist for a non-profit natural gas research institute.

lender.name: MC_Glick
lender.loan_because:
1) I like to help people who want to help themselves.
2) Kiva lets me be an alternative to the usurious loans that apparently dominate in developing countries.
3) I'm opposed to government foreign aid that goes to kleptocracies and ineffective (or even destructive) big-budget projects and rarely filters down to those who truly need it.
4) Business is the free exchange of goods and services between people. If anything makes the world go round, that is it, so I try to enable it.
5) Kiva.org lets people decide for themselves how they will work and use the funds, rather than telling them how or what to do, like some "Fair Trade" and other similar top-down organizations.
6) I can.
lender.occupational_info: I taught English to Japanese college students as well as wrote articles, most frequently about materials design. Occasionally I engage in contractual work, usually proofreading English texts. At present I work on a production line in a factory.

lender.name: Marc,Jane, Matt & Claire
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves, and we want to share our good fortune.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me. I hope to spread this blessing to others and at the same time hope to spread the Good News, that Jesus Christ has died for you, and all you have to do is invite him into your heart.
lender.occupational_info: I design and create newer and faster computers.

lender.name: hilaria
lender.loan_because: for business
lender.occupational_info: small sari sari / retail store

lender.name: Shari
lender.loan_because: I come from a poor family, but with a little help, I made it out ok. I love to travel now and I want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a coffee shop in the city. I'm also a college student. I love it!

lender.name: Carolinka
lender.loan_because: I can, at this micro level
lender.occupational_info: assisting attorney at an NGO represent clients negotiating the byzantine labyrinth of bureaucracy involved in family and refugee/asylee based immigration to the USA.

lender.name: Anamaria
lender.loan_because: It's pretty inspiring to see all these entrepreneurs out there in the world who are trying to chase new opportunities and cultivate the ability to choose their own course of development. Not every individual has a true entrepreneurial spirit---so it's great to be able to contribute and support some special individuals who do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with mining companies to help them improve their social and environmental performance. (In short, I help them "behave better.") Really though---I work with companies on how to do community engagement and community development in a way that is strategic and makes sense for the business, but also ultimately has true social impact in the host communities where these companies operate.

lender.name: Blaine
lender.loan_because: All people deserve to live a happy and healthy life!

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I raise corn, soybeans, oats, hay and wheat on a small organic farm.

lender.name: ann
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help change the world, one small donation at a time.I'd like to believe poverty and despair are unacceptable no matter your income, your place of origin, no matter your color and no matter your age.
lender.occupational_info: I retired from Fed Ex, then opened a small aromatherapy shop,.

lender.name: Heidrun
lender.loan_because: I love it to make a difference. The amount of money that I loan buys so much more than in my own country.
lender.occupational_info: I am developing software for a living. I also write novels, screenplays, and manuals for mental training.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should.
lender.occupational_info: I design advertisements for print (mostly for newspapers).

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I like helping people build sustaining businesses for themselves, because no one likes to be pitied. Teaching people skills and helping to start a new business goes leagues further than handing over a blank check.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an entrepreneur with an avid interest in web and mobile technologies. I program software, write business documentation, collaborate with talented people, and build useful products for helping people discover the things they'll truly love.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in somebody's life and the place that they live.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a unit within an oil refinery that produces diesel, jet fuel, gasoline, and other petrochemical products

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It is an awesome, joyous and exhilarating feeling to make someone's dream come true, like mine did!
lender.occupational_info: Recently, I had a windfall, so right now, I am devoting my time to developing a plan for the money and figuring out what I want to do with my life.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I believe that each individual has the ability to help others achieve their dreams in a variety of ways. This is one of them.
lender.occupational_info: I work for AmeriCorps, an organization that does community service projects across the United States. My job is to recruit new members and tell communities, through their news media, about the good projects we are doing - helping children, building new homes, improving the environment, and responding to disasters.

lender.name: Leena
lender.loan_because: I like to believe that an individual can make a difference. Microloans are a very concrete way to affect people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I solve problems with computers and help maintain our company IT infrastructure and services.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my son how a good it feels to give and how a small bit can go a long to making someone's life better
lender.occupational_info: test software programs (like the ones on this site)

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: It helps develop the economy of the world and will help people help themself.
lender.occupational_info: I train emergency medical personnel

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: Each dollar I put into Kiva comes back to me again and again so I can keep choosing to help another person take care of their family and their community. In this way I can afford to be helpful over and over for as long as there are people who are asking for help to build a better life. This on-going sustained generosity is not possible with charitable gifts.
lender.occupational_info: I teach teachers how to help students learn better by teaching respect, responsibility and resourcefulness at all times. Then after the children are comfortably immersed in those lessons the teachers can also teach reading, writing and arithmetic or whatever is called for.

lender.name: Christie
lender.loan_because: I love to see people succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I help design wastewater treatment systems to keep our rivers, lakes & oceans clean. Clean water is essential to all life and to keep it clean we need to manage our wastewater. www.linkedin.com/in/cat147

lender.name: Janet

lender.occupational_info: I help people by protecting his/her interests in things like divorces and child custody fights.

lender.name: Theboerwar
lender.loan_because: we believe that government bureaucracy often gets in the way, and costs too much, preventing maximum benefits of the programs they've put in place. Individuals helping individuals is the quickest way to get positive results for the betterment of lives and communities.
lender.occupational_info: Design of all types - from textile patterns to television commercial motion graphics.

lender.name: elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and wish to share with others.

lender.name: Sheila

lender.name: Koffi

lender.name: Sylvia

lender.name: Just Falcons
lender.loan_because: We're a social justice group in a Catholic High School in the Algonquin Lakeshore Catholic District School Board. Microcredit is a way to exercise the "preferential option"for helping those who want to help themselves. Yay!
lender.occupational_info: Our group organizes events to raise awareness about issues of social injustice in the world in the light of the good news of the gospel. Our school participates in Habitat for Humanity builds (we went to Harrisburg, Penn. this year) , Earth Day Trash Bash, Microcredit Summit in Halifax 2007, Thinkfast 24 fast to raise funds for Canadian Catholic Organization for Development and Peace, and a Dominican Rep. Exposure Tour every year. We've rasied funds for water purification biofilters for bateys we visit every year in the Dr. We even built our own house in Trenton with Habitat for Humanity. We also sleep outside in cardboard boxes in the winter to raise funds for Habitat and to try to identify with the Homeless. We participate in Street Retreats in Toronto twice a year to learn about the causes of poverty in Canada.

lender.occupational_info: Experienced jack of all trades IT Professional, Softwaredeveloper, Systemadministrator, Trainer. Helping others getting things done.

lender.name: Rebecca

lender.occupational_info: Customers invite me and their friends over. I show them a line of jewelry or skin care products that I sell and the host receives free products in return!

lender.occupational_info: I am a single mother of 2 children, with out a home right now. I do odd jobs to get money, yard work mostly.

lender.name: Minnie
lender.loan_because: i've been there
lender.occupational_info: i am an administrative assistant to a hand-painted yarn artist, as well as spin my own yarns for sale. my blog is www.dragonmadknitter.blogspot.com

lender.name: Luckner
lender.loan_because: Just trying to help.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Capitalism is the road to freedom. Optimism makes dreams reality.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I have been given so much simply because I was born in the United States. I want to share what I have been given, so that others can live better.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an agency in the our local government that protects the environment. I am a cartographer for that agency--I make maps.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Psalm 37:26 "They [the righteous] are always generous and lend freely; their children will be blessed."
lender.occupational_info: Financial management professional, entrepreneur, scholar

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I edit an international business journal.

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I help my company to release their products doing whatever is needed to achieve that goal.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I think its the right thing to do. I know there are people out there that need money to help their families and get on with their lives. I want to help them, so they can help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Well, I'm just a kid and my grandma suggested I try Kiva out...and I like it so far!

lender.name: Omar
lender.loan_because: I need to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Medical Student

lender.name: Sparks family
lender.loan_because: we can make a difference.

lender.name: shiko
lender.loan_because: people need help, its our lend, safer than the banks in the US/UK!
lender.occupational_info: newspaper

lender.name: Teemu
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: If you can make a difference and help someone in need you should. KIVA is providing a great way to do this-I'm a true believer in empowering people to help themselves.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Its been a couple of years now. Its a nice little positive to have in my life. As people keep repaying their loans, I get to give more and more.
lender.occupational_info: I setup meditation programs to help people live better lives.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I can help do what governments can't.
lender.occupational_info: I program computers at a mutual funds company.

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: My sis is a youth worker and worked out in Africa at a shelter for kids orphaned by AIDS. She's a big believer in helping the local people develop the skills so they can become more independent and provide a way forward for themselves. If this helps, I'm happy to participate so someone can make a better go of things.

lender.name: Ailsa
lender.loan_because: I think it a good thing to do and it is a direct way to get money into the hands of women who need it. Top down does not always work. Bottom up helps the entrepreneur and her community.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large medical practice in Amherst Massachusetts. I am involved in the day to day operation of the facility.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to help others but often do not get around to it. Kiva is a brilliant project.

lender.name: HC Middle School
lender.loan_because: We learned about the power of microloans and know they build 'capability' in people.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of Grade 7 and 8 students who work together to learn about how we can make a difference in the world and then act. We believe in working with others because of our shared humanity. We are all better off when we work together.

lender.name: Dr Ihsanullah
lender.loan_because: i need some invest ment in skill development in female sector in distt charsadda.
lender.occupational_info: iskill development project will give support to 1000 females in the area.

lender.name: Alexandria
lender.loan_because: I believe in providing opportunities for economic independence.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: It's a way to keep the love flowing and to help others help themselves.

lender.name: C L
lender.loan_because: I desire to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help people fund their dreams through marketing quality products badly needed in our society.

lender.name: Silvia
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping other help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization, as a secretary.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get their books published.

lender.name: Fbio
lender.loan_because: i loan becose this make me fell good

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing. I consider myself to be very lucky and I want to be able to share some of the luck and good fortune I have received.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Accountant, numbers are my business.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I love supporting these great business ideas and it's wonderful to give someone, somwehere, some help, however small.
lender.occupational_info: I manage software development and deliver projects to customers.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: My daughter inspired me to give back! Delana was one of the first Kiva fellows to travel to Africa.
lender.occupational_info: I teach middle school.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone else's life. I lend primarily to women because I believe when women are able to get out of poverty the first people to benefit are her children.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home with my two children and care for my family.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Lending a hand to enterprising spirits in developing nations helps grow the personal and cultural traits that will lead peoples around the world out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I study buildings and bridges, and ways to make them safer.

lender.name: Patricia and Chuck
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate here in the U.S. and take even the smallest things for granted. I want to share our blessings with others around the world so that they have the chance to be successful at whatever is important to them.
lender.occupational_info: own a day spa where we help people who have chronic pain or health issues, as well as relaxing and stress relieving massage and spa therapies.

lender.name: Scarlett
lender.loan_because:
I want to help individuals who have a dream of making a brighter future for themselves and their families. I made my first loan when I sold back a textbook and received $50, an unexpected amount.
I can so easily go about my daily life without thinking about individuals in the developing world who do not always have access to things like education and healthcare that I take for granted. Loaning is a way for me to feel connected to people who are thriving despite poverty.
We have a commitment to each other as humans to look out for the well being of others, regardless of any social constructs such as nationality or race.
I believe in Kiva's vision. I hope to join the Peace Corps with my husband in two years so that I can do more to make this world a better place. My contribution may be small, but if we all do a little, then a difference can be made.

lender.name: Solomon Broad
lender.loan_because:
Please *do not* contact me via Kiva.
The money that I waste on frivolities like a Starbucks coffee or a chocolate bar can make a life-changing difference to these people. It's nothing to me, but it's an awful lot to them.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a shop, selling building materials. Very humdrum.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: It's each of our responsibility to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work for our public schools, letting the community know the great things we do to educate children.

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Access to capital is what drives all businesses, and it's great to be able to directly help an individual further their business.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It can make a difference and feels good
lender.occupational_info: I find ways of using computers to make my company more efficient

lender.name: Rosalind
lender.occupation: Program Manager- Non Profit Childrens Partnership

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: My friends and family and I think this is a great way for us to make a huge impact on someone's livlihood. We like the idea of lending rather than just giving.

lender.name: yann
lender.loan_because: I believe in the principle that if "you teach a man how to fish, he will eat for a lifetime". There are tremendously great people out there, let's give them a helping hand to make them achieve their true potential!
lender.occupational_info: stuck in the business world, I truly believe though that now it is time for a wake up call and positive impact, far from the short-sighted P&L focus!

lender.name: Edward C
lender.loan_because: a person to person loan means I can have a sense i know where my money is going and who I am helping.

lender.name: The Chandler Foundation
lender.loan_because: "The survival of the world depends upon our sharing what we have and working together. Fools Crow. Ceremonial Chief of the Teton Sioux"
lender.occupational_info: A Metis Family. Haudenosaune, (Mohawk), Montagnais (First Nation)and French Canadian trying to bring change to our brothers and sisters on the Lakota Sioux Reservation at Pine Ridge, South Dakota (http://nativeprogress.org)and to third world entrepreneur's, via KIVA. We are all remotely related and it's time to even the score among all the peoples of the world! If we do not come together as one, we will surely perish! The small changes that we are able to bring about, will be remembered by generations, of the people we have helped!

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: It's cool, and Kiva rocks.
lender.occupational_info: My employer is an amazing statewide advocacy organization that is working hard to get kids in Washington state the best public education possible.

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: Reaching out and helping is part of why we are here.

lender.name: Judith
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large university library in the United States.

lender.name: Courtland
lender.loan_because: With the state of the world being what it is, I want to do whatever I can to help improve the lives of those who want to work to build a better life for themselves, their families, and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a regional manager for a compliance firm.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in this world, however small my part may be.
lender.occupational_info: I work on software. It is sometimes very challenging but rewarding too, and it funds my trips to go diving! I teach scuba as well to share this awesome world with others.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping someone to help themselves. If a small loan from me can sustain a family I am getting more than I am giving.
lender.occupational_info: I build affordable homes for those who need a place to live and have modest resouces.

lender.name: Phil
lender.occupational_info: Chips. Computer chips.

lender.name: Sean
lender.occupational_info: I help other people manage their money.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: I sit in an office and try to look serious.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: This is so much better than blindly donating money.

lender.name: Sumit
lender.loan_because: I want to lend a hand in raising the standard of living of others.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies plan their activities so that they manufacture goods efficiently.

lender.name: Andy and Serenity
lender.occupation: Follow Jesus, Love People, Be Simple
lender.loan_because: We love Jesus, and believe in God's Economy. The money we have is on loan from Him. Matthew 25:40.
lender.occupational_info: We travel the United States and Canada and love people, sharing what we have been given to the poor and marginalized we meet.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Helping those that wish to help themselves is a priveledge.
lender.occupational_info: I train competitive boxers and military special forces.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: If you believe in the capitalist system, you should practice it.
lender.occupational_info: Now partially retired, but managed and invested in airline, aviation ground support and publishing companies.

lender.name: Russ & Elaine
lender.loan_because: we all need a hand now and again.

lender.name: toffer
lender.loan_because: Because I can live without my money longer than most of these people can.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I research hormone behavior relations in mammals.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I believe it is hard for women to get business loans and want to give them an equal opportunity - or at least a start.

lender.name: Mona & Randy Simoneaux
lender.loan_because: We enjoy it.
lender.occupational_info: IT Analyst & Administrative Assistant

lender.name: Anthony Obeyesekere
lender.loan_because: Changing the world, one step at a time. :)
lender.occupational_info: I work on economic analysis and forecasting.
